title: Small Doses Refill: Side Effects of Organizing (with Erica Ford).
description:
This week, I talk about about how I’ve incorporated organizers into my tour, and then we revisit our episode with organizer Erica Ford of LIFE Camp, who empowers us with proactive ways to approach social justice.
~
Get tickets to The Black Outside Again Tour! amandaseales.com/tourdates
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/amandaseales)!
~
Your new favorite shoes are waiting. Discover the versatile styles you can wear absolutely anywhere and get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/DOSES.
Get 30% off your first subscription when you text DOSES to 64-000. Message and data rates may apply. Terms apply, available at OraOrganic/terms.
Download Best Fiends for FREE from the App Store or Google play. Plus, earn even more with $5 worth of in-game rewards when you reach level 5. That’s Friends, without the r—Best Fiends.
For listeners of the show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to DipseaStories.com/DOSES.
Get glasses as unique as you are. One pair, infinite style. Starting at just $60. Go to paireyewear.com/DOSES for 15% off your first purchase.
